TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示在資料繫結控制項中以影像顯示的欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別由資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 來顯示影像，以顯示每一筆記錄。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display an image for each record displayed. 物件顯示的方式會依據資料繫結控制項中使用。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制項顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項所顯示的是它的資料列。For example, the control displays an object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要顯示的映像，您必須將繫結物件欄位從資料來源包含之影像的 URL。To display images, you must bind an object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image. 這可以藉由設定屬性。This is accomplished by setting the property. 使用可格式化的 URL 值屬性。The URL value can be formatted by using the property. 每個映像也可以有與其相關聯的替代文字。Each image can also have alternate text associated with it. 映像無法載入，或無法使用時，會顯示此文字。This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將這個文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. 您可以使用其中一種下列方法指定顯示的影像的替代文字：You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods: - 使用屬性來指定適用於所有的映像的替代文字。Use the property to specify alternate text that applies to all images. - 使用屬性，將欄位繫結至資料來源的每個映像的屬性。Use the property to bind a field from a data source to the property of each image. 這可讓您可使用不同的替代文字，顯示每個映像。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 當資料繫結，您可以選擇性地使用格式化的替代文字屬性。When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the property. 當影像的 URL 值是`null`，無法顯示影像。When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以顯示的替代映像`null`藉由設定欄位值屬性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字屬性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. 根據預設，會顯示資料繫結控制項中的所有宣告的欄位。By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性設`false`。You can hide an object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段物件。You can customize the header and footer sections of an object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段顯示標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 若要顯示在標頭區段，而不是文字的映像，請設定屬性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在藉由設定物件屬性設`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別繫結的資料欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual data-bound field. 若要顯示或隱藏的資料繫結控制項的整個標頭區段，使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性 （如果有的話）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件中控制項來顯示影像。The following example demonstrates how to use an object in a control to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要動態方式加入物件至資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add an object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，新增物件到集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入至資料繫結控制項，強烈建議，欄位會以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視情況。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位，可減少父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以動態方式加入物件至的集合控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to dynamically add an object to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/CS/ImageFieldCtorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/VB/ImageFieldCtorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件中影像所顯示的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the object.

value.span: 物件中顯示影像的替代文字。

span.span: The alternate text for an image displayed in the object.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定在所顯示之影像的替代文字物件。Use the property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an object. 無法載入影像，或無法使用時，會顯示的替代文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將這個文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定，在顯示的所有映像物件共用相同的替代文字。When this property is set, all images displayed in an object share the same alternate text. 或者，您可以繫結的替代文字中的資料來源的欄位設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the property instead of this property. 這可讓您可使用不同的替代文字，顯示每個映像。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定所有的映像中顯示的替代文字物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for all images displayed in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出從資料來源傳回欄位值時，是否將空字串 ("") 值轉換成 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are returned from the data source.

value.span: 如果 值應該轉換成 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if values should be converted to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者可能在更新或插入資料錄的欄位值輸入空字串。Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用屬性來指定是否為空字串值自動轉換成`null`資料欄位的資料來源中的更新時Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source > [!NOTE] > 類別顯示`null`為預設的空字串。The class displays `null` as empty strings by default. 若要顯示不同的值，設定屬性。To display a different value, set the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源中的欄位名稱，這個欄位的值將繫結至 物件中每個影像的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 欄位名稱，這個欄位將繫結 物件中每個影像的 屬性。

span.span: The name of the field to bind the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定名稱的欄位從資料來源包含要繫結至的值屬性中每個影像物件。Use the property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. 可讓您有不同的替代文字，顯示每個映像。The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 無法載入影像，或無法使用時，會顯示的替代文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將這個文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 您可以指定藉由設定適用於所有的映像的替代文字而不是這個屬性的屬性。You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the property instead of this property. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，欄位會優先。If both the and properties are set, the field takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定來源資料中的欄位名稱，包含要繫結至的值屬性中每個影像物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataAlternateTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataAlternateTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataAlternateTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataAlternateTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataAlternateTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定 物件中每個影像之替代文字的呈現格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 字串，指定 物件中每個影像之替代文字的呈現格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂格式中顯示之影像的替代文字值物件。Use the property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 套用的格式字串時，才屬性設定。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 它不是當屬性設定。It is not applied when the property is set. 當您需要修改之欄位中包含的原始值時，這非常有用。This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field. 如果屬性未設定，替代文字值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常會包含欄位的值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值： {0}"，"{0}"所指定之欄位的值取代預留位置屬性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源的欄位值不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 預留位置是由以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成 (":") 和包裝在大括號 ("{}")，在表單中`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此參數會是語法的格式化的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號之後的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定用來顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示在指定的大小寫的十六進位字元。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元 (一般的範例中為 xx) 後的值指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0:F2}」 會顯示 2 個小數位數定點數字。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來套用自訂格式中的映像的替代文字值物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the alternate text values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 欄位名稱，這個欄位將繫結至 物件中每個影像的 屬性。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定繫結至欄位的名稱屬性中每個影像物件。Use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. 指定的欄位必須包含影像的 Url 中顯示物件。The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the object. 您可以選擇性地藉由設定格式化 URL 值屬性。You can optionally format the URL values by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 當欄位的值是`null`，無法顯示影像。When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以顯示的替代映像`null`藉由設定欄位值屬性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字屬性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定繫結至欄位的名稱屬性中每個影像物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定 物件中每個影像之 URL 的呈現格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 字串，指定 物件中每個影像之 URL 的呈現格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示 URL 未套用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂格式中顯示之影像的 url物件。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an object. 當您需要產生的 URL，例如當此方法物件只會包含檔案名稱。This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the object simply contains the file name. 如果屬性未設定、 URL 值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常會包含欄位的值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值： {0}"，"{0}"所指定之欄位的值取代預留位置屬性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源的欄位值不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 預留位置是由以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成 (":") 和包裝在大括號 ("{}")，在表單中`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此參數會是語法的格式化的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號之後的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定用來顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示在指定的大小寫的十六進位字元。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元 (一般的範例中為 xx) 後的值指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0:F2}」 會顯示 2 個小數位數定點數字。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，將自訂的格式套用至的 URL 值中的映像物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the URL values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 在 .NET 中將類型格式化

span.span: Formatting Types in .NET

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用以擷取欄位的值從指定的協助程式方法物件中物件。The method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in an object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 這個方法不會傳回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反地，透過參考所傳回的欄位值物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看物件來存取的欄位值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 若要包含唯讀欄位值在物件，傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數。To include the read-only field values in the object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時所使用的 helper 方法類別，以判斷哪些值時要顯示的欄位轉譯設計工具中的物件。The method is a helper method used by the class to determine what value to display for a field when rendering an object in a designer. 如果在設計階段，無法從資料來源擷取實際的資料，這個方法所傳回的值改為顯示。If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫用的資料控制項物件相關聯執行基本的物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位會不斷新增到欄位集合, 的執行個體。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection. 資料控制項，例如並呼叫方法中的其`CreateChildControls`方法，這類其他方法之前`CreateRow`呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data. 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項使用物件來執行基本的初始設定物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for an object. 實作這個方法，如果您-衍生的型別需要的任何物件初始化之前它會填入,物件的資料或控制項方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定文字，當 屬性所指定的欄位值為 時， 物件中將顯示此文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display in an object when the value of the field specified by the property is .

value.span: 當欄位值為 時，所要顯示的文字。

span.span: The text to display when the value of a field is .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位的值指定時屬性是`null`，映像無法顯示在物件。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用屬性來指定要在映像的位置顯示的文字。Use the property to specify the text to display in the image's place. 文字通常表示一般的映像無法使用或找不到。The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以替代映像時顯示的欄位值是`null`藉由設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果並同時設定了屬性，屬性的優先順序。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示欄位的值所指定的文字屬性是`null`。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位的值指定時屬性是`null`，映像無法顯示在物件。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用屬性來指定要顯示替代影像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display. 替代映像通常是表示一般的映像無法使用或找不到映像。The alternate image is usually an image that indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以只顯示文字的欄位值時`null`藉由設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。As an alternative, you can simply display text when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果並同時設定了屬性，屬性的優先順序。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定替代的映像時所指定的欄位值顯示的 URL屬性是`null`。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以在編輯模式下修改 屬性所指定的欄位值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the values of the field specified by the property can be modified in edit mode.

value.span: 表示在編輯模式下無法修改欄位值，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that the field values cannot be modified in edit mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所指定的欄位值資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，可以由使用者修改屬性。By default, the values of the field specified by the property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode. 若要防止使用者變更欄位的值，請將此屬性設定為`true`。To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 物件，屬性通常會包含的包含物件中顯示之影像的 Url 的欄位名稱。In an object, the property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示欄位值，代表中顯示之影像的 Url處於編輯模式，無法修改物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the field values that represent the URLs to the images displayed in an object cannot be modified in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/CS/ImageFieldReadOnlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/VB/ImageFieldReadOnlyvb.aspx#1)]

.field public static initonly string ThisExpression
Public Shared ReadOnly ThisExpression As String
public: static initonly System::String ^ ThisExpression;

summary.span: 表示 "this" 運算式。

span.span: Represents the "this" expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位用來指出物件應該要繫結至資料來源本身，而非已歸檔的資料來源。The field is used to indicate that the object should bind to the data source itself rather than a filed of the data source. 在此情況下，傳回的值物件的方法將會顯示在欄位中。In this case, the value returned by the object's method will be displayed in the field.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 決定 物件中包含的控制項是否支援回呼。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來判斷控制項是否包含在 helper 方法物件支援回呼。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 這個方法已實作作為空白方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），以表示支援回呼。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 衍生自類別類別可以覆寫這個方法，以指出控制項是否包含欄位支援回呼。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，此方法實作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況，使用描述為什麼不支援回呼的有用訊息，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
